= Various types of hyperlink targets

Clicking on this internal hyperlink will take us to the [[target|target]]
below.

The hyperlink target above points to this paragraph.

The targets "target1" and "target2" are synonyms; they both point to this
paragraph.

See the [[http://www.python.org|Python]] home page or the
[[http://mail.python.org/pipermail/doc-sig/|archive]] for info.

[[jdoe@example.com|Write to me]] with your questions.

This [[underscore\_|link]] refers to a file called {{{underscore_}}}.
